name: Get Dungoned
description:
You are about to get dungoned!

This tiny game was made for GAMEHIGHED Jam in 2021. The theme was YOLO. Play this tiny rogue-like game with card controls. There are 21 different cards, which either help you or throw you into the pit. Get the highest score you can during your life and live it to the fullest. 

Watch out a dungeon is pretty much completely randomized, so you can get bad cards or luck, and bye-bye, you love only once after all.   

Controls :

Mouse - Select cards and other buttons
Spacebar - Confirm Turn
Esc - Suicide (back to menu)

Mechanics:

  • You can only have 6 cards in hand
  • You can't draw more cards by your self, only by new turn or by special card
  • If your deck goes to zero, you'll gonna lose HP every turn
  • You can get rid of your cards only by playing them or getting a special "cleaning" card
  • Every card cost AP (small dots on the card)
  • You get 2AP points per turn
  • Keys can be found or got from the deck
  • Combat is dice-based, and the side with a higher number wins.

Cards:

  • Add to deck 5/10 cards
  • Remove your AP cards
  • Remove HP cards
  • Add HP cards
  • Add AP cards
  • Attacks cards (heavy or Light)
  • Draw more cards
  • Key card
  • Cleaning card
  • Movement cards
  • Waiting card
